text:
Biology.
He's doin it right.

text: lyle is going to stone cold menace you into education.

name: philosophe
text: [b] Education.[b] = 5

name: philosophe
text: A comment left by philosophe was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by farqussus, Sneakernets, zeitgeist)

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
for an instant, i thought you were roman-numeraling here, then i realized there was no 'P' back then.

..which makes you wonder why aqueducts ever happened.

This has been Malformed History with cpnglxynchos .

name: chaesar
text: A 3.4?? Come on people, they've got Todd in a flowerbed, talking about singing a different tune!!

name: saint
text: ...the tune of education! I love how mr. bear is watering the flower bed that todd is standing in. do you think he's watering the flowers too ?!

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I voted and made it a 3.5

name: mopeydroney
text: Yes. 5'd for the flowerbeds

name: ladydj
text: Amazing.

name: dejavroom
text: I was being naked in my room.

name: i_love_kate
text: I tend to lame comments that are just directly ripped from the strip, (Unless everyone else is doing it,) but in your case I laughed in fear at the accompanying avatar. And what the two, intertwined, did insinuate.

name: farqussus
text: you made me do what you did.

name: fizhburn
text: Education.

name: juancarlos
text: Education. Hah, definitely a Five. don't know why it's so low.

name: juancarlos
text: Education. I meant.

name: leon_sumbitches
text: html and bbcode get me confused too.

name: shoinan
text:
It's almost like the Prisoner sequence - INFORMATION... INFORMATION... and then Patrick McGoohan says "You won't get it". That's JUST like how Teodor ruined this strip.

Does that mean Teodor is Number 6?

name: 1000hz
text: By education they mean Todd is going to teach you how to smuggle coke across the border.

name: mystkmanat
text: That is a useful skill.  You never know when you might need it.

name: cdl146
text: Why is Teodor such an exhibitionist in these early strips?

name: joamiq
text: Well considering that he later gets into the adult entertainment business, I'm not sure that this should come as much of a surprise.

name: djlockjaw
text: Being naked ruins education. No naked schools for me!

name: audhumla
text: Cornelius has a lovely garden

name: godfatherofsouls
text: naked with sweatband is always a 5

name: aurorasbored
text: Oh the days of the house meeting when chore plans were re-drawn and interpersonal issues re-aired. And usually one person was gone having audible sex.

name: baryonyx
text: Lyle in the third panel would be the highlight of the strip for me. I see him as running gracefully across the frame, miming the flight of a swan as he pronounces the word.

name: brynito
text: But...but I like weiners and boners. Boo to education.

name: mattylite
text: Is that a towel around Lyle's shoulders in the first panel? Did Lyle take a shower? OH GOD I THINK LYLE TOOK A SHOWER

name: hamscout
text:
Lyle puts his foot up on the bench, and leans in to give you the "concerned coach" speech...

"Folks, I've washed three generations of filth off me, so I could talk to you about testicular cancer ..."
*flops out of gym shorts*

name: ampkit5
text: Why the hell is this not rated higher?  Lets get it together people...

name: farqussus
text: because the Teodor's punchline deserves a laugh track.

name: coco
text: I like the infomercial feel of this strip . . . I feel like the next panel would be Ray yelling cut and coming over to slap T in the face.

name: seph
text: There's someone else talking through Philippe's mouth.

name: a_knobbie
text:
Educating us on the nakedness level of Teodor.
